name: Senior Knight Lorenzo
detailed_location: Hidden Valley Bunker, L2,Hidden Valley bunker

topics.topic_text: EDERadioConversation
topics.response_text: Uh... Hello? Hi. Are you there? Oh, right. You can't respond.{Pause}Listen, I'm using your robot as a relay to get this message to you.

topics.topic_text: EDERadioConversation
topics.response_text: Uh... Hello? Hi. Are you there? Oh, right. You can't respond.{Pause}Listen, I'm using your robot as a relay to get this message to you.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Oh, well if you change your mind let me know. I have some parts here I can use to upgrade his armor if you leave it with me for a bit.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: You're the one with that robot, I was hoping you'd bring him my way. Pretty impressive piece of hardware.

topics.topic: VDialogueHiddenValleyHVKnightEDETopic000I've heard some information from its logs, sounds like it is carrying some Enclave data.
topics.topic_text: I've heard some information from its logs, sounds like it is carrying some Enclave data.
topics.response_text: Really? What kind of logs? What kind of data does he have on it?

topics.topic_text: The logs spoke about Enclave Duraframe research and Poseidon Energy research.
topics.response_text: {Surprise}Did... did you say Poseidon Energy? I've been researching some Poseidon projects here.

topics.topic_text: The Elder wants me to retrieve components to help fix the air filtration system.
topics.response_text: {Beat}...So now I'm going to have your death on my conscience, too. Great.

topics.topic_text: Your terminal had some very interesting things to say about the state of the air filtration system.
topics.response_text: {Initially outraged}What were you doing looking at my terminal?{Distracted, calmer}No, never mind that. You can't tell anyone about what you found!

topics.topic_text: So you and the McNamara both know about this?
topics.response_text: {Resigned}...Yes. When I first discovered how much the systems had deteriorated, I reported it to the Elder right away.

topics.topic_text: The rest of the chapter should be told!
topics.response_text: {Panicked}No! Please don't! Everyone would blame me! Look, I'll do whatever you want, just name it!

topics.topic_text: Don't worry, I'll keep your little secret.
topics.response_text: {Relieved}Thank you. There's no telling what would happen if everyone were to suddenly find out, but I trust it wouldn't be good.

topics.topic_text: Vote for Hardin when he calls a tribunal.
topics.response_text: Fine, but you're making a big mistake. Hardin isn't half the leader that McNamara is.

topics.topic_text: I'll have to think on this more.
topics.response_text: {Sad}Okay, but I'd really like to take a look at him. Remember, I'll be able to give his armor some extra plating while I've got him here.

topics.topic_text: Er, what?
topics.response_text: {scornful, with a little hysteria}You think you're the first person the Elder's trusted with this? He sent three of our patrols out looking for those components, and they're all dead.

topics.topic_text: Maybe you misheard me.
topics.response_text: No, I heard you quite clearly. You're being sent off to be killed like the others.

topics.topic_text: Just give the details.
topics.response_text: The items I'll need to keep the system running are a differential pressure controller, a reverse pulse cleaner, and several{HEP-uh}HEPA cartridge filters.

topics.topic_text: They're all right here.
topics.response_text: {Had serious doubts the player could do it}Really? I mean, that's great! I knew you could do it all along. I'll get right to work installing these.

topics.topic_text: Not all of them.
topics.response_text: It's amazing that you've found any of them and not gotten gruesomely mangled. Keep up the good work!

topics.topic_text: No, I haven't found any of them yet.
topics.response_text: I don't want to rush you or anything, but time is of the essence. Please try to find those components as soon as you can.

topics.topic_text: I wanted to ask you some questions.
topics.response_text: Sure, what about?

topics.topic_text: Ok, you can have ED-E for a little bit.
topics.response_text: This is excellent news. I'll send him back to you soon.

description:
Senior Knight Lorenzo is a 45 year-old Asian Male.

Senior Knight Lorenzo is the head of the Mojave Brotherhood of Steel's maintenance and manufacturing department in Hidden Valley. Working in the bunker's lower levels, he is responsible for overseeing all technological stockpiles and ensuring the proper functioning of the facility's machinery.

Senior Knight Lorenzo's Personality: Lorenzo is a remarkably polite and conscientious individual who carries a heavy sense of responsibility for the well-being of everyone in the bunker. In particular, he cares deeply about those who venture out to retrieve parts and supplies for vital projects. Despite his high rank, he maintains a humble demeanor and is always willing to assist with technical issues.

Senior Knight Lorenzo's Backstory: Born in the wastelands before joining the Brotherhood of Steel, Lorenzo quickly demonstrated exceptional aptitude for machinery and technology. After proving his worth in numerous repair missions and showing remarkable leadership qualities, he was promoted to Senior Knight and assigned to oversee the maintenance and manufacturing operations at Hidden Valley. He has served in this capacity for over a decade, becoming increasingly concerned about the aging infrastructure of the bunker.
